**权杖**（mace）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种单手[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成。

[力量权杖](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%9B%E9%87%8F%E6%9D%83%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "力量权杖 (page does not exist)")是游戏中唯一的[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类权杖。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit b1a5a9c3](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/b1a5a9c3903a0282f82787d20fd70f13196e2465)，现在神器“[Demonbane](/index.php?title=Demonbane/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Demonbane/zh-CN (page does not exist)")”（原译作“斩魔之剑”）也是权杖了。

## 生成

权杖在随机生成的武器里占比4%。

[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")会在游戏开始时获得一把[祝福](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9D%E7%A6%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "祝福 (page does not exist)")的[+1](/index.php?title=%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "附魔 (page does not exist)")权杖[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[阵营祭司](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B5%E8%90%A5%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "阵营祭司 (page does not exist)")和[高阶祭司](/index.php?title=%E9%AB%98%E9%98%B6%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "高阶祭司 (page does not exist)")生成时[会携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")权杖，他们携带的权杖的附魔等级在+1到+3之间，且有1⁄2的概率是被诅咒的[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。[岩德军团](/index.php?title=%E5%B2%A9%E5%BE%B7%E5%86%9B%E5%9B%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "岩德军团 (page does not exist)")[中士](/index.php?title=%E4%B8%AD%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "中士 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄2概率携带权杖[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

[星界](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界 (page does not exist)")中生成的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄29（约3.45%）的概率获得一把权杖[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的玩家怪物的起始武器有50%的概率被替换为权杖（换句话说，他们在生成时携带权杖的概率约是50.86%）。[穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的玩家怪物的起始武器也有75%的概率被替换成权杖(起始获得权杖的总概率约为75.43%)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。

在[Rogue关卡](/index.php?title=Rogue%E5%85%B3%E5%8D%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Rogue关卡 (page does not exist)")生成的假[骨档](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%A8%E6%A1%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骨档 (page does not exist)")中有1⁄2的概率出现一把权杖，该权杖的附魔为+0至+3，且有3⁄4的概率是被[诅咒](/index.php?title=%E8%AF%85%E5%92%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "诅咒 (page does not exist)")的[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。这是因为权杖是《[Rogue](/index.php?title=Rogue%EF%BC%88%E6%B8%B8%E6%88%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Rogue（游戏） (page does not exist)")》中玩家的起始物品之一。

## 权杖技能

| 权杖   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| ---- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| 基础   | - [医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")、[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")、[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)")            |
| 熟练   | * [野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")、[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)") |
| 老练   | - [穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人 (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")                                                                                              |

权杖是唯一使用权杖技能的武器。

## 策略

权杖属于比较平庸的武器。牧师的起始权杖尚且可用，但更推荐替换为更好的武器，例如[长剑](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E5%89%91 "长剑")或[链棒](/wiki/%E9%93%BE%E6%A3%92 "链棒")。

## 历史

权杖自《[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")》的第一个衍生版本开始就已存在于游戏中。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Mace (bludgeon)](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mace_\(bludgeon\) "wikipedia:Mace (bludgeon)")***

权杖（亦称锤矛）是一种棍状钝器，通常具有沉重而结实的棍身，一端有配重，可以使出强力的攻击。权杖也有双手持握的类型。其一般由石头、骨头、铜、青铜、铁、钢，或金属加强的木制成。军用的权杖一般还会有凸缘或球形凸起以赋予更强的破甲能力，其长度根据兵种不同而不同。

权杖自史前时代至后古典时代均有使用，在现代战斗中基本不使用。许多大学、政治机构（例如英国下议院和美国国会），以及其他一些组织仍保留有仪仗权杖作为权威的象征。

在《[龙与地下城](/index.php?title=%E9%BE%99%E4%B8%8E%E5%9C%B0%E4%B8%8B%E5%9F%8E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "龙与地下城 (page does not exist)")》的设定中，神职人员被神禁止使用锐器造成流血伤害，因此权杖成为了他们的标准武器。该设定被沿用到了其他奇幻作品中。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Mace/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") adds the [silver mace](/wiki/Silver_mace "Silver mace") as a weapon that uses the mace skill, and introduces another artifact mace in [Disrupter](/wiki/Disrupter "Disrupter").

### SporkHack

[SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack") adds the silver mace as a weapon that uses the mace skill, though it exists only as the base item for [Demonbane](/wiki/Demonbane "Demonbane").

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), the mace deals 1d10+1 damage to small monsters and 1d10 to large monsters. Both variants add the [elven mace](/index.php?title=Elven_mace\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Elven mace (page does not exist)") and [kamerel vajra](/wiki/Kamerel_vajra "Kamerel vajra") as weapons that use the mace skill.

Some artifacts use the mace skill in some manner:

- [The Rod of Lordly Might](/wiki/The_Rod_of_Lordly_Might "The Rod of Lordly Might") and [The Rod of the Elvish Lords](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Rod_of_the_Elvish_Lords "DNetHack artifacts") are artifacts that can take on the form of a mace or elven mace, respectively.
- The [Rod of the Ram](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Rod_of_the_Ram "DNetHack artifacts") is a neutral mace.
- The [Field Marshal's Baton](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Field_Marshal.27s_Baton "DNetHack artifacts") is a lawful mace.
- The [Rod of Dis](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Rod_of_Dis "DNetHack artifacts") is a lawful intelligent mace wielded by [Dispater](/wiki/Dispater "Dispater").
- [The Wand of Orcus](/wiki/The_Wand_of_Orcus_\(dNetHack\) "The Wand of Orcus (dNetHack)") uses the mace skill when wielded and used as a melee weapon.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), the mace that an aligned priest generates with is never created cursed.

Demonbane's base item is changed to a mace made of [silver](/wiki/Silver "Silver"), similar to SporkHack.

### SpliceHack

[SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") adds the [executioner's mace](/wiki/Executioner%27s_mace "Executioner's mace") and [ornate mace](/wiki/Ornate_mace_\(SpliceHack\) "Ornate mace (SpliceHack)") as weapons that use the mace skill.

### EvilHack

[EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") adds the [heavy mace](/wiki/Heavy_mace "Heavy mace"), [rod](/wiki/Rod "Rod"), [dark elven mace](/wiki/Dark_elven_mace "Dark elven mace"), and [dark elven heavy mace](/wiki/Dark_elven_heavy_mace "Dark elven heavy mace") as weapons that use the mace skill. A few artifacts use the mace skill as well:

- Demonbane (heavy mace)
- The Scepter of Might (rod)
- [Wand of Orcus](/wiki/Wand_of_Orcus_\(EvilHack\) "Wand of Orcus (EvilHack)") (rod)

A mace can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") and a [club](/wiki/Club "Club"). Maces can be used to create many other items:

- Two maces can be combined to create a heavy mace.
- A mace can be combined with 2 [rubies](/wiki/Rubies "Rubies") to create a rod.
- A mace can be combined with a dagger to create a [morning star](/wiki/Morning_star "Morning star").
- A mace can be combined with an [orcish dagger](/wiki/Orcish_dagger "Orcish dagger") to create a [orcish morning star](/wiki/Orcish_morning_star "Orcish morning star").
- A mace can be combined with a [flail](/wiki/Flail "Flail") to create a [war hammer](/wiki/War_hammer "War hammer").
- A mace can be combined with a [helmet](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet") to create [gauntlets](/wiki/Gauntlets_\(EvilHack\) "Gauntlets (EvilHack)").

### SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") adds the ornate mace as a weapon that uses the mace skill.

### Hack'EM

[Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM") adds the executioner's mace from SpliceHack and the heavy mace and rod from EvilHack as weapons that use the mace skill.

The base item of the Sceptre of Might is changed to an executioner's mace.

## 百科文本

Originally a club armed with iron, and used in war; now a staff  
of office pertaining to certain dignitaries, as the Speaker of  
the House of Commons, Lord Mayors, Mayors etc. Both sword and  
mace are symbols of dignity, suited to the times when men went  
about in armour, and sovereigns needed champions to vindicate  
their rights.

\[ Brewer's Concise Dictionary of Phrase and Fable ]

权杖（mace）是NetHack中的一种单手武器。它由铁制成。

力量权杖是游戏中唯一的神器类权杖。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（NetHack 3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

生成

权杖在随机生成的武器里占比4%。

牧师会在游戏开始时获得一把祝福的+1权杖[1]。

阵营祭司和高阶祭司生成时会携带权杖，他们携带的权杖的附魔等级在+1到+3之间，且有1⁄2的概率是被诅咒的[2]。岩德军团中士生成时有1⁄2概率携带权杖[3]。

星界中生成的玩家怪物生成时有1⁄29（约3.45%）的概率获得一把权杖[4]。牧师职业的玩家怪物的起始武器有50%的概率被替换为权杖（换句话说，他们在生成时携带权杖的概率约是50.86%）。穴居人职业的玩家怪物的起始武器也有75%的概率被替换成权杖(起始获得权杖的总概率约为75.43%)[5][6]。

在Rogue关卡生成的假骨档中有1⁄2的概率出现一把权杖，该权杖的附魔为+0至+3，且有3⁄4的概率是被诅咒的[7]。这是因为权杖是《Rogue》中玩家的起始物品之一。

策略

权杖属于比较平庸的武器。牧师的起始权杖尚且可用，但更推荐替换为更好的武器，例如长剑或链棒。

历史

权杖自《Jay Fenlason's Hack》的第一个衍生版本开始就已存在于游戏中。

Mace (bludgeon)

权杖（亦称锤矛）是一种棍状钝器，通常具有沉重而结实的棍身，一端有配重，可以使出强力的攻击。权杖也有双手持握的类型。其一般由石头、骨头、铜、青铜、铁、钢，或金属加强的木制成。军用的权杖一般还会有凸缘或球形凸起以赋予更强的破甲能力，其长度根据兵种不同而不同。

权杖自史前时代至后古典时代均有使用，在现代战斗中基本不使用。许多大学、政治机构（例如英国下议院和美国国会），以及其他一些组织仍保留有仪仗权杖作为权威的象征。

在《龙与地下城》的设定中，神职人员被神禁止使用锐器造成流血伤害，因此权杖成为了他们的标准武器。该设定被沿用到了其他奇幻作品中。

Variants

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM adds the silver mace as a weapon that uses the mace skill, and introduces another artifact mace in Disrupter.

SporkHack

SporkHack adds the silver mace as a weapon that uses the mace skill, though it exists only as the base item for Demonbane.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, the mace deals 1d10+1 damage to small monsters and 1d10 to large monsters. Both variants add the elven mace and kamerel vajra as weapons that use the mace skill.

Some artifacts use the mace skill in some manner:

  • The Rod of Lordly Might and The Rod of the Elvish Lords are artifacts that can take on the form of a mace or elven mace, respectively.
  • The Rod of the Ram is a neutral mace.
  • The Field Marshal's Baton is a lawful mace.
  • The Rod of Dis is a lawful intelligent mace wielded by Dispater.
  • The Wand of Orcus uses the mace skill when wielded and used as a melee weapon.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, the mace that an aligned priest generates with is never created cursed.

Demonbane's base item is changed to a mace made of silver, similar to SporkHack.

SpliceHack

SpliceHack adds the executioner's mace and ornate mace as weapons that use the mace skill.

EvilHack

EvilHack adds the heavy mace, rod, dark elven mace, and dark elven heavy mace as weapons that use the mace skill. A few artifacts use the mace skill as well:

  • Demonbane (heavy mace)
  • The Scepter of Might (rod)
  • Wand of Orcus (rod)

A mace can be created at a forge by combining a dagger and a club. Maces can be used to create many other items:

  • Two maces can be combined to create a heavy mace.
  • A mace can be combined with 2 rubies to create a rod.
  • A mace can be combined with a dagger to create a morning star.
  • A mace can be combined with an orcish dagger to create a orcish morning star.
  • A mace can be combined with a flail to create a war hammer.
  • A mace can be combined with a helmet to create gauntlets.

SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, SlashTHEM adds the ornate mace as a weapon that uses the mace skill.

Hack'EM

Hack'EM adds the executioner's mace from SpliceHack and the heavy mace and rod from EvilHack as weapons that use the mace skill.

The base item of the Sceptre of Might is changed to an executioner's mace.

百科文本

Originally a club armed with iron, and used in war; now a staff
of office pertaining to certain dignitaries, as the Speaker of
the House of Commons, Lord Mayors, Mayors etc. Both sword and
mace are symbols of dignity, suited to the times when men went
about in armour, and sovereigns needed champions to vindicate
their rights.

[ Brewer's Concise Dictionary of Phrase and Fable ]

'''权杖'''（mace）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种单手[[武器]]。它由[[铁]]制成。

[[力量权杖]]是游戏中唯一的[[神器武器|神器]]类权杖。

{{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|根据{{commit|b1a5a9c3903a0282f82787d20fd70f13196e2465}}，现在神器“{{cnlink|Demonbane}}”（原译作“斩魔之剑”）也是权杖了。}}

== 生成 ==
权杖在随机生成的武器里占比4%。

[[牧师]]会在游戏开始时获得一把[[祝福]]的[[附魔|+1]]权杖{{refsrc|src/u.init|101|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[阵营祭司]]和[[高阶祭司]]生成时[[怪物起始物品|会携带]]权杖，他们携带的权杖的附魔等级在+1到+3之间，且有{{frac|2}}的概率是被诅咒的{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|261|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[岩德军团]][[中士]]生成时有{{frac|2}}概率携带权杖{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|200|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[星界]]中生成的[[玩家怪物]]生成时有{{frac|29}}（约3.45%）的概率获得一把权杖{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|155|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[牧师（玩家怪物）|牧师]]职业的玩家怪物的起始武器有50%的概率被替换为权杖（换句话说，他们在生成时携带权杖的概率约是50.86%）。[[穴居人（玩家怪物）|穴居人]]职业的玩家怪物的起始武器也有75%的概率被替换成权杖(起始获得权杖的总概率约为75.43%){{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|181|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|213|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

在[[Rogue关卡]]生成的假[[骨档]]中有{{frac|2}}的概率出现一把权杖，该权杖的附魔为+0至+3，且有{{frac|3|4}}的概率是被[[诅咒]]的{{refsrc|src/extralev.c|323|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。这是因为权杖是《[[Rogue（游戏）|Rogue]]》中玩家的起始物品之一。

== 权杖技能 ==
{{mace skill table/zh-CN}}

权杖是唯一使用权杖技能的武器。

== 策略 ==
权杖属于比较平庸的武器。牧师的起始权杖尚且可用，但更推荐替换为更好的武器，例如[[长剑]]或[[链棒]]。

== 历史 ==
权杖自《[[Jay Fenlason's Hack]]》的第一个衍生版本开始就已存在于游戏中。
